verses.verse: ( The Flourishing of the Righteous) אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš A man who תּ֭וֹכָחוֹת <WH8433> tō·w·ḵā·ḥō·wṯ after much reproof מַקְשֶׁה־ <WH7185> maq·šeh- remains stiff-necked עֹ֑רֶף <WH6203> ‘ō·rep̄ ... פֶּ֥תַע <WH6621> pe·ṯa‘ will suddenly יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר <WH7665> yiš·šā·ḇêr be shattered וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> wə·’ên - מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> mar·pê beyond recovery.

בִּרְב֣וֹת <WH7235> bir·ḇō·wṯ flourish, צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> ṣad·dî·qîm When the righteous יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> yiś·maḥ rejoice, הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people וּבִמְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> ū·ḇim·šōl rule, רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <WH7563> rā·šā‘ but when the wicked יֵאָ֥נַֽח <WH584> yê·’ā·naḥ groan. עָֽם׃ <WH5971> ‘ām the people
